channel.title: perl6 on noisytoot
channel.description: Recent content in perl6 on noisytoot

item.title: mq
item.description: A program that asks you maths questions, written in Perl 6, and licensed under the GNU GPL v3.0 Installation instructions for Unix-like operating systems (like Linux, BSD, Mac OS X) Using git Install mq using: cd ~ git clone https://github.com/Noisytoot/mq cd mq ln -s $PWD/mq.p6 /usr/local/bin/mq # Replace /usr/local/bin/mq with where you want to install mq, you may need root permissions to run this mkdir ~/.
